pages.text: The plains are one of the oldest and most basic biomes. Between $(l:blocks/grass)tall grass$(), $(l:blocks/flower)small flowers$() and $(l:world/tree)oak trees$(), you will find all the usual monsters and animals.

There is also a variant of this biome called the Sunflower Plains, which, instead of tall grass, consists predominately from sunflowers, and a snow-covered variant, called Tundra, in which $(l:biomes/taiga)snowy taiga$() features and spruce trees generate instead of the usual structures and trees.
